rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0010
rows.name: Okay, who we searchin' for next?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'll tell you. There's a BLADE who departed NLA
and hasn't come back in yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0030
rows.name: I want you to go pick him up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0040
rows.name: You say "pick up..."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0050
rows.name: So you know where he is?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0060
rows.name: Yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0070
rows.name: Eric, clue these guys in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0080
rows.name: Roger that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0090
rows.name: I'm Eric, Curator and captain of the eponymous Team Eric.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0100
rows.name:
I'm a bit embarrassed to admit,
but it's my subordinate Ted who needs help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0110
rows.name: Ted is having some trouble accepting the Exodus plan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0120
rows.name:
He said he wasn't going anywhere,
then flew off in a huff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0130
rows.name: We feared this might happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0140
rows.name: First we left Earth, now we're leaving Mira...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0150
rows.name: He won't be the only one with internal struggles right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0160
rows.name: Yeah, I'm sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0170
rows.name: To be perfectly honest, I'm wrestling with it too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_JNK0010
rows.name: Berate

rows.label: xs32280100_SEL0010
rows.name: Call it a selfish thing to do.

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0180
rows.name:
Ease up, Rook.
The man must be under enough pressure as is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_JNK0020
rows.name: Empathize

rows.label: xs32280100_SEL0020
rows.name: Admit to having doubts as well.

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0190
rows.name: But, cannot just carry on in quiet![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0200
rows.name: Believe me, I've been there too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0210
rows.name: We're Curators. In our line of work, generally,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0220
rows.name: we handle a lot of animals and plants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0230
rows.name: You start to have a lot of sympathy for the natural world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0240
rows.name: I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0250
rows.name: Flora and fauna are not part of the Exodus plan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0260
rows.name: Right...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0270
rows.name: It's a thorny one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0280
rows.name: Well, the first step's to meet the man and hear him out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0290
rows.name: Agreed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0300
rows.name: He'll be at the Canopied Nightwood in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0310
rows.name: It was the location of our first mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0320
rows.name: Noted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32280100_MSG0330
rows.name: I appreciate it.[ST:wait ]
